name: Sleepless
summary: Sleepless is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Ermes, a sick boy who finds freedom from his time in the hospital through the world of books. This game has some dialogue and light puzzle elements. There are 4 full worlds to explore, several unique npcs, 6 effects, and 3 puzzles.
